alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Greene; Hale; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 30 at 1:57AM CST until November 30 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Greene, Hale, Jefferson, Pickens, Sumter and Tuscaloosa. * WHEN...Until 500 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 157 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tuscaloosa, Northport, Eutaw, Aliceville, Holt, Moundville, Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Coker, Akron, Boligee, Union, Gainesville, North Johns, Emelle and McMullen.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
